attributes.action: Public Enquiry into £12billion, Track and Trace APP...Where did the money go?
attributes.additional_details: It looks totally corrupt that an APP using Microsoft Excel would cost £12 billion...The cost must be audited and accounted for.
attributes.background: Public Enquiry into how this money was spent and where it went to.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555502
